name: Mines and Magic
description: This game is a fantasy themed tower defense with automatically fighting towers-units and significant economics component. To get resources the player will have to build mines and expand territory. Balance between economy and army is a key to success.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1200 mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated, HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1800 mhz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GFX 650 or higher, AMD RX 200 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
